flawed_nl_solution:
50 x 60/100 = <<50*60/100=250/3>>250/3 people support the first team.
50 x 34/100 = <<50*34/100=17>>17 people support the second team.
So, a total of 250/3 + 17 = <<250/3+17=301/3>>301/3 people supported the first and second teams.
Thus, 50 - 301/3 = <<50-301/3=-151/3>>-151/3 people did not support either team.
#### -151/3

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 30, not 250/3. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
